type.name: org.gradle.api.execution.TaskExecutionGraphListener
type.description:
*

A {@code TaskExecutionGraphListener} is notified when the {@link TaskExecutionGraph} has been populated. You can * use this interface in your build file to perform some action based on the contents of the graph, before any tasks are * actually executed.

method.name: graphPopulated
method.description:
*

This method is called when the {@link TaskExecutionGraph} has been populated, and before any tasks are * executed. * * @param graph The graph. Never null.
